causes: poor sending reputation from sudden volume spikes
spammy copy patterns and link tracking issues
immediate_actions: reduce volume and warm up gradually
improve content: reduce spam triggers and add plain-text style
mistakes: blasting cold lists at high volume
sending from a fresh domain without warm-up
too many links/trackers and aggressive subject lines
no unsubscribe or unclear sender identity
prevention: monitor reputation and inbox placement weekly
